ValidationRule.description: If a Sales User selects "Inbound Call" for the Lead Source, then a Inbound Color Code is required before saving a lead record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Inbound Call"), ISPICKVAL(Omniture_Campaign_Code__c,"") && ISBLANK(Omniture_Campaign_Code_Copy__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An Inbound Color Code is required when "Inbound Call" is selected as the Lead Source. Please complete the "Add Inbound Color Code" field before saving.
